contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Querrien |native name = Kerien |image = Mairie de Querrien.JPG |caption = Querrien village hall |longitude = -3.5356 |latitude = 47.9606 |arrondissement = Quimper |canton = Scaër |INSEE = 29230 |postal code = 29310 |mayor = Marcel Moysan |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Pays de Quimperlé |elevation min m = 13 |elevation max m = 172 |area km2 = 54.01 |population = 1674 |population date = 2008 }} '''Querrien''' ({{Lang-br|Kerien}}) is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Finistère]] [[Departments of France|department]] of [[Brittany (administrative region)|Brittany]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== Inhabitants of Querrien are called in French ''Querriennois''. {{Demography | 1793=2397 | 1800=2516 | 1806=2390 | 1821=2796 | 1831=2871 | 1836=2982 | 1841=3103 | 1846=3260 | 1851=3282 | 1856=3019 }} {{Demography |noheader=yes | 1861=2527 | 1866=2561 | 1872=2183 | 1876=2630 | 1881=2840 | 1886=3000 | 1891=3153 | 1896=3173 | 1901=3260 | 1906=3346 }} {{Demography |noheader=yes | 1911=3453 | 1921=3232 | 1926=3280 | 1931=3114 | 1936=3043 | 1946=3005 | 1954=2597 | 1962=2372 | 1968=2118 | 1975=1858 }} {{Demography |noheader=yes | 1982=1759 | 1990=1650 | 1999=1596 | 2008=1674 }} ==Breton language== The municipality launched a linguistic plan through [[Ya d'ar brezhoneg]] on March 7, 2007. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Finistère department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} *[http://www.amf29.asso.fr/ Mayors of Finistère Association] {{Fr icon}} ==External links== *[http://www.querrien.org Official website] {{commons|Category:Querrien|Querrien}} {{Finistère communes}} [[Category:Communes of Finistère]] {{Finistère-geo-stub}}
